書名: 台南縣民間文學集5—台南縣閩南語故事集（四）

段: 佇這个抵仔好、抵仔好這个粟仔割起來，啊得卜坉彼个廟地，啊抵仔草坔彼个做工事彼个煞毋知卜做啥貨啦，彼个抵仔來，呀遮無土，啊土著清氣相才來坉廟地才會使哩。呀抵仔草坔抵仔彼个魚塭仔一條岸成大條，得卜提起來，提起來呀王爺知，王爺知，變做一个老人，去共討土，伊將仔討，講：「好哦！哎～！啊這个老人nai2無去？討土nai2無去？一个老人呔會無去？哎～，彼毋池王來得共我討土？好！好！好！」安呢啦。

Ti7 che e5 tu2-a2-ho2, tu2-a2-ho2 chit e5 chhek-a2 koah--khi2-lai5, ah tit-beh thun7 he e5 bio7-te7, ah tu2-a2 chhau2-lam5 hit e5 cho3-kang-su7 hit e5 soah m7 chai beh cho3 sann2-hoe3 lah, hit e5 tu2-a2 lai5, iah chia bo5 thou5, ah thou5 tioh8 chheng-khi3-siunn3 chiah lai5 thun7 bio7-te7 chiah e7-sai2 lih.  Iah tu2-a2 chhau2-lam5 tu2-a2 hit e5 hi5-un3-a2 chit8 tiau5 hoann7 chiann5 toa7-tiau5, tit-beh theh8--khi2-lai5, theh8--khi2-lai5 iah Ong5-ia5 chai, Ong5-ia5 chai, pian3-cho3 chit8 e5 lau7-lang5, khi3 ka7 tho2 thou5, i chiong-a2 tho2, kong2: “Ho2 ouh! Aih～! Ah chit e5 lau7-lang5 nai2 bo5 khi3? Tho2 thou5 nai2 bo5 khi3? Chit8 e5 lau7-lang5 thai3 e7 bo5 khi3? Aih～, he m7 Ti5-ong5 lai5 teh ka7 goa2 tho2 thou5? Ho2! Ho2! Ho2!”An2-ne lah.
